mapper.select: SELECT T1.STTM_DVSN_CD , T1.ACP_YR , T1.STTM_ACP_NO , T3.FL_RUT_NM , T3.SYS_FL_NM FROM TBCSPDCP811M T1 , TBCSPDCP818M T2 , TBDCMACM103L T3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.STTM_DVSN_CD = #{sttmDvsnCd} AND T1.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND T1.STTM_ACP_NO = #{sttmAcpNo} AND T1.STTM_DVSN_CD = T2.STTM_DVSN_CD AND T1.ACP_YR = T2.ACP_YR AND T1.STTM_ACP_NO = T2.STTM_ACP_NO AND T2.IFM_DVSN_CD = #{ifmDvsnCd} AND T2.ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID = T3.ONR_DOC_MNG_CRD_ID AND T3.ONR_APV_FL_DVSN_CD = 'A'
